item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * Attempt to fix the fact that the game will sometimes delete local zipped mod descriptors by locking said descriptors using readonly flag * Thread compress merge (limit to 4 threads max) * Fix some minor mod merge progress calculation bugs * Descriptor refresh now retains mod descriptor lock state
CHANGES FROM v1.8: * Upgrade to net5 * Upgrade dependencies * Fix conflict solver UI issue with conflict solver dropdown menu opening on the wrong screen (more like Avalonia hack fix) * Add new merge type called compress which zips all mod files into local mod directory * Add option to remove merged mods (for all types unless these mods folders have been renamed)
